member.name: T:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdContext
member.summary: Thread-safe implementation of correlation ID context using AsyncLocal storage. Integrates with OpenTelemetry Activity for automatic trace correlation.

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdContext.Current
member.summary: Gets the current correlation ID for the executing context. First checks AsyncLocal storage, then falls back to current Activity baggage.

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdContext.CurrentAsString
member.summary: Gets the current correlation ID as a string. Returns empty string if no correlation ID is set.

member.name: M:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdContext.Set(System.Guid)
member.summary: Sets the correlation ID for the current executing context. Updates both AsyncLocal storage and current Activity baggage.

member.name: M:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdContext.Generate
member.summary: Generates a new correlation ID and sets it as the current context.

member.name: M:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdContext.Clear
member.summary: Clears the current correlation ID context.

member.name: M:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdContext.GetCurrentCorrelationIdStatic
member.summary: Static method to get current correlation ID for use by static extension methods. Uses the same logic as the Current property.
member.returns: The current correlation ID or Guid.Empty if none is set.

member.name: M:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdContext.SetCorrelationIdStatic(System.Guid)
member.summary: Static method to set correlation ID for use by background services.

member.name: T:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdDelegatingHandler
member.summary: HTTP client delegating handler that automatically adds correlation ID headers to outgoing HTTP requests for cross-service correlation.

member.name: T:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdLoggerProvider
member.summary: Logger provider that enriches log entries with correlation IDs.

member.name: T:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdLogger
member.summary: Logger that automatically enriches log entries with correlation IDs.

member.name: T:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdMiddleware
member.summary: Middleware that extracts or generates correlation IDs from HTTP requests and ensures they are available throughout the request pipeline.

member.name: T:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for correlation ID middleware.

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdOptions.HeaderName
member.summary: The header name to use for correlation ID. Default is "X-Correlation-ID".

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdOptions.IncludeInResponse
member.summary: Whether to include the correlation ID in response headers. Default is true.

member.name: T:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdServiceCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for configuring correlation ID services.

member.name: M:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdServiceCollectionExtensions.AddCorrelationId(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdOptions)
member.summary: Adds correlation ID services to the service collection.
member.returns: The service collection for method chaining.

member.name: M:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdServiceCollectionExtensions.UseCorrelationId(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Adds correlation ID middleware to the application pipeline.
member.returns: The application builder for method chaining.

member.name: M:Shared.Correlation.CorrelationIdServiceCollectionExtensions.AddCorrelationIdWithHttpClient(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{System.Net.Http.HttpClient})
member.summary: Adds correlation ID services with HTTP client integration.
member.returns: The service collection for method chaining.

member.name: T:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLoggerExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for ILogger that provide hierarchical logging with consistent 6-layer structure. Maintains consistent ordering: OrchestratedFlowId -> WorkflowId -> CorrelationId -> StepId -> ProcessorId -> PublishId -> ExecutionId

member.summary: Logs a debug message with hierarchical context

member.summary: Creates a logging scope with hierarchical context for automatic inclusion in all log statements within the scope

member.summary: Core logging method that handles hierarchical context integration

member.summary: Builds structured attributes for OpenTelemetry/Elasticsearch with consistent ordering

member.summary: Template information cached for performance optimization

member.name: M:Shared.Correlation.TemplateInfo.FormatMessage(System.Object[])
member.summary: Formats the message template with provided arguments

member.name: M:Shared.Correlation.TemplateInfo.GetParameterName(System.Int32)
member.summary: Extracts parameter name from placeholder by removing curly braces

member.name: T:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLogState
member.summary: Optimized custom log state with template caching that preserves hierarchical attributes alongside message template parameters

member.name: M:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLogState.ParseTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Parses message template to extract placeholders for caching

member.name: F:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLogState.Formatter
member.summary: Optimized formatter that returns pre-computed formatted message

member.name: T:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLoggingContext
member.summary: Hierarchical logging context that maintains the 6-layer ID hierarchy for structured logging. Provides consistent ordering: OrchestratedFlowId -> WorkflowId -> CorrelationId -> StepId -> ProcessorId -> PublishId -> ExecutionId

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLoggingContext.OrchestratedFlowId
member.summary: Layer 1: Orchestrated flow identifier (always present)

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLoggingContext.WorkflowId
member.summary: Layer 2: Workflow identifier (present from orchestration level)

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLoggingContext.CorrelationId
member.summary: Layer 3: Correlation identifier (always present for tracing)

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLoggingContext.StepId
member.summary: Layer 4: Step identifier (present from step execution level)

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLoggingContext.ProcessorId
member.summary: Layer 5: Processor identifier (present from processor execution level)

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLoggingContext.PublishId
member.summary: Layer 6: Publish identifier (present from message publishing level)

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLoggingContext.ExecutionId
member.summary: Layer 6: Execution identifier (present from individual execution level)

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLoggingContext.Layer
member.summary: Gets the current hierarchy layer based on available IDs

member.name: M:Shared.Correlation.HierarchicalLoggingContext.CalculateLayer
member.summary: Calculates the current layer based on which IDs are present Optimized with ternary operators for best performance with early exit

member.name: T:Shared.Correlation.ICorrelationIdContext
member.summary: Provides access to the current correlation ID context. Manages correlation ID storage and retrieval in a thread-safe manner.

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.ICorrelationIdContext.Current
member.summary: Gets the current correlation ID for the executing context. Returns Guid.Empty if no correlation ID is set.

member.summary: Sets the correlation ID for the current executing context.

member.summary: Generates a new correlation ID and sets it as the current context.

member.summary: Clears the current correlation ID context.

member.name: P:Shared.Correlation.ICorrelationIdContext.CurrentAsString
member.summary: Gets the current correlation ID as a string. Returns empty string if no correlation ID is set.
